Recipe

Estimated Time: 78 Minutes

Rub the 1 pound Top Sirloin with Dried Thyme
Timer 60 minutes Souvide steak at 132 degrees
Timer 1 minute Pan fry steak on largest side
Timer 1 minute Pan fry steak on 2nd largest side
Timer 30 seconds Pan fry steak on 3rd largest side
Timer 30 seconds Pan fry steak on 4th largest side
Timer 15 minutes Let steak sit for at least 15 min

Ingredients

Top Sirloin 1 pound
Dried Thyme 2 dashs

Recipe

Estimated Time: 78 Minutes

Rub the 1 pound Top Sirloin with 2 dashs Dried Thyme
Timer 60 minutes Souvide steak at 132 degrees
Timer 1.5 minutes Cook Grill steak in oven @ 500°
Flip steak
Timer 1.5 minutes Cook Grill steak in oven @ 500°
Timer 15 minutes Let steak rest
